issue.title: [CI] Find a short but related prefix for the env vars used for the docker-compose file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7125](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7125). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To prevent collisions with the host's environment.

The defaults are defined in the [.env](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.env) file. These environment variables are used across the whole [docker-compose](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docker-compose.yml) file, so every occurrences should be updates.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7125?focusedCommentId=17349269) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
We have been using the current env vars for a long time now without further problems, like: `UBUNTU=20.04 archery docker run ubuntu-cpp`

So I think we can keep the current naming.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7125?focusedCommentId=17586032) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
